groceries â‡€ Zero Grocery

What do they make

Zero Waste groceries, including fresh and dry pantry goods. California Bay Area only.

Visit Zero Grocery

Why Less Mess recommends

Zero Grocery delivery grocery is new and currently only available in California's Bay Area, but we hope to see them expand. They do a full-range of pantry goods, dairy, meat, bakery, fruit and vegetables and sell a lot of it at bulk-buy prices in returnable glass jars. They also have a selection of home goods.
